sub_title: Freelance Copywriter, Podcast Producer and Communications Consultant
summary:
I am a freelance copywriter and podcast producer based in Melbourne and London. Adept at developing the highest quality written and audio content, I work with a broad cross section of organisations and individuals, both in Australia and internationally.

During my fifteen-plus years spent working in public relations and corporate communications, I have honed my writing skills and developed a knack for determining the correct style, tone and messaging to resonate with any target audience.

No matter the topic, my passion lies in creating excellent and compelling written and audio content to help build brands - website copy, blogs, scripts, speeches, media releases, newsletters podcasts and magazines.

Additionally, since October 2012, I have worked in-house with the communications team at Dementia Australia - the peak body for dementia - in a consultancy capacity.

profile_positions.description:
With a life-long passion for writing - both professional and recreational - I offer freelance copywriting and podcast production services to corporates, not-for-profits, individuals, web developers, digital marketers and PR agencies, both in Australia and internationally. 

Whatever the topic, I am adept at developing the highest quality written and audio content with the perfect style, tone and messaging to engage the target audience.

My passion lies in creating compelling content that helps build brands - website copy, blogs, scripts, speeches, media releases, brochures, annual reports, newsletters podcasts and magazines - whatever the project, if there's writing to be done, I would love to be involved.

My diverse portfolio spans health and medical, IT, education, food, fashion, design and just about everything else in between! Whatever the topic, allow me come up with the words to communicate your message in a way that truly resonates.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Copywriter & Podcast producer

profile_positions.description:
Alzheimer’s Australia Vic is the state’s peak body for people living with dementia and their families and carers. It provides advocacy, support services, education and information.

I worked with the organisation in a consultancy capacity. This role included: 

Planning, implementing and evaluating the media and communications strategy.

Developing, coordinating and proofing written communication materials, including printed magazine ‘Memory Matters’.

Providing sound strategic advice to the Chief Executive Officer and other members of the Senior Management Team on public relations, media issues and speech writing.

Liaison with traditional media outlets and developing engaging social media content.
profile_positions.title: Communications Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Red Agency is a multi-award winning public relations and marketing communications consultancy with offices in Melbourne, Sydney and Brisbane. The agency is part of Havas Worldwide – one of the largest integrated marketing communications agencies in the world.

In my role as Account Manager, I developed a reputation for implementing communications campaigns from initial concept, planning and strategy development, right through to execution.

Key clients included RACV Motorclassica, Coffee Club, Reckitt Benckiser (brands including Vanish Napisan, Mortein and Veet), Murray Regional Tourist Board, Warner Bros. Consumer Products, Humax, Aegis and Queensland Rail Travel.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Pesel & Carr is a boutique corporate communications consultancy based in Melbourne, Australia. 

Here, I served as Account Manager for key clients including Whitelion, Variety Victoria, Save the Children, Etihad Stadium, Spirit of Tasmania, William Angliss Institute, Husqvarna, Sampford IXL, Golf Australia, fortyfivedownstairs and Yachting Victoria.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Communications Consultant

profile_positions.description:
TrimediaHC (now part of Grayling Global) is a world-renowned pan-European Public Relations agency.

Based out of offices in Leeds and London, I managed the day-to-day communications activities involved with regional and national public relations campaigns for clients including British Telecom (BT), McDonald’s, Gatecrasher, the RSPCA, UK Transplant and the National Blood Service (NBS).
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Executive

volunteer_experiences.description:
Switchboard Victoria Incorporated is a volunteer organisation which provides a telephone counselling, referral and information service for the Victorian and Tasmanian lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, intersex and queer (LGBTIQ) communities.

During a recent organisational re-brand, I sat on a committee of volunteers and developed written content for much of the newly produced and designed collateral.
